item.title: 6.3.1 Notifications
item.description: Manage notifications # When the user wants to Archive Notification, the following 2 conditions must be met: ON receive notifications. One of 3 options (App, Email, Telegram) is ON. To view notifications, do one of the following: Way 1: Click on Manage > Alert - Schedule > Notifications. Way 2: Click on Notification > View all. 1.

item.title: 6.3.2 Alert Rules
item.description: Alert Rules # ‚ùó When a rule is violated, an alert will be issued to the user. To view the Alert Rules, do the following: Click on Manage > Alert - Schedule > Alert rules. 1. Create new # Step 1: Click Create New. Step 2: 2.1 Alert type: Click on Alert type.

item.title: 6.3.3 Report Schedule
item.description: Scheduled report # Scheduled report is to schedule, select the time period to get data and send the report automatically. Task Type: Schedule Daily: The next day will automatically send the report. The data in the report file will be from yesterday. Weekly: Every Monday will automatically send the previous week’s report. Send to email: Send report to email. Task type: Performed once Will send report immediately after successful creation.

item.title: 6.3.4 Task Remind
item.description: Task Remind # Task Remind is created to notify about app/web, automatically send email reminders to devices when needing maintenance or a related event,… Normally people forget, so the system will help you to remind when the warning level is reached. To view reminders, follow these steps: Click on Manage > Alert - Schedule > Remind. 1. Create new # Step 1 : Click on Create Remind.
